bibl.title: Other Poetic Voices in Callimachus. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: In Competition with Hesiod? [Fr. 2 Pf. = 4 M.]. - Tragic Voices in Callimachus. - The New Voice of Hipponax.
